Mail
----

69,23,46,92,2,58,29,87,1,65,13,52,26,78,6,42,21,63,9,81,27,54,18,36,72,24,48,96,12,84,28,56,14,98,49,7,35,70,10,60,30,90,45,15,75,25,50,100,20,40,80,16,32,64,8,88,44,22,66,33,99,11,55,5,85,17,34,68,4,76,38,19,57,3,93,31,62

(length 77)

However, I'm not sure 77 is maximum lenght possible (still longest I could find in a given time with given resources ;-)). Though I am confident that max is < 84 (quite possibly even <=82).

I have to say: nice puzzle :-). I had fun trying to cut down search space a bit, proving upper bounds... (maybe if I had found the puzzle sooner? ;-)). Keep up good work, looking forward to new puzzle.
